subject: Weather
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As temperatures soared around the country, baseball fans used a variety of ways traditional (hats, fans, water, beer) and less so (mummy-wrappings of wet paper) to beat the stadium heat.
snippet: As temperatures soared around the country, baseball fans used a variety of ways traditional (hats, fans, water, beer) and less so (mummy-wrappings of wet paper) to beat the stadium heat.
